Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: so to see mobile wallet balance

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: i have to send most recent tx in native mode

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if you don't like change address, don't use native mode

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: that is thing, see

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: send all funds to your mobile wallet address, and use only Lite mode or mobile wallet from that point forward

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: kmd support told me i have to use native mode to see balance in mobile wallet

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: what ticket number?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if you have funds in your native wallet in a different change address and you don't see them in mobile wallet, you need to use native mode first to send funds in the address where that you are using in mobile.

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: why does it automatically create a address though?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: have you ever used BTC in native mode?

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: no, only electrum

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: you cannot assume everyone here is used to running btc in native mode or run nodes

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: different ways to support ecosystem

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: i did not assue, i asked you

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Change

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: read this wiki to understand about change address

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: to fix this problem, how? send funds from original address to original address?

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: in native mode, yes?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: To fix this, you need to send funds to your mobile wallet address or any other address that is not listed in your native wallet using native mode

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: or, export the private key of the address that contains the funds and use Agama lite mode to login using the privkey to send the funds to your desired address

Author: Nabob#5004
Content:
@Torankoku  why you are in panic ? native mode is used to handle multiple address and spv/ mobile uses single address.

after you claim funds,  your remaining funds move to change address in your same wallet, i have seen your receive tab screenshot. funds are there within your wallet

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: this is automatic?

Author: Nabob#5004
Content: dont check funds on mobile yet it will show single address funds, like @SHossain  said you need to understand concepts first

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: so wait a few days, is what you are saying?

Author: Nabob#5004
Content: nothing is automatic, now your immediate action, send full funds to your original address

Author: Torankoku#4818
Content: ok

Author: Seko#7408

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: Yes, most of them. Pirate will be hardforked as well. but, there is not chain split

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: just the main chain

Author: skyguynca#0562
Content:
komodod: main.cpp:3640: void PruneBlockIndexCandidates(): Assertion `!setBlockIndexCandidates.empty()' failed.
does anyone know what this means? happens everytime I start kmd, i have to add -reindex to get it running and then wait 20 hours while it reindexes....fix? thanks

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: backup wallet.dat file first. then, delete all files from data dir except wallet.dat and start the wallet again.

Author: skyguynca#0562
Content: ok, will try it, thanks

Author: ABP brewmaster#0177
Content:
@Team  Admin @Admin Hi guys when I am trying to perform the first atomic swap. I am getting different results when running the enable_my script with this
```source userpass
./setpassphrase > /dev/null
curl -s --url "http://127.0.0.1:7783" --data "{\"userpass\":\"$userpass\",\"method\":\"enable\",\"coin\":\"KMD\"}"
curl -s --url "http://127.0.0.1:5426" --data "{\"userpass\":\"$userpass\",\"method\":\"enable\",\"coin\":\"ABP\"}"
```
I am getting no output with regards to ABP, while wallet is running on the instance.

When changing the port back to 7783 for ABP I get this result

``` % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
100 55000    0 54825  100   175   110k    360 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--  110k
[{"coin":"KMD","installed":true,"height":0,"balance":0,"KMDvalue":0,"status":"active","smartaddress":"RFfwgcfXKzESxqDjqTAaUWVXAFpRt9D1Ky","rpc":"127.0.0.1:7771","pubtype":60,"p2shtype":85,"wiftype":188,"txfee":1000,"zcredits":0,"zdebits":{"swaps":[],"pendingswaps":0}}]
{"error":"couldnt find coin"}```

I really appreciate your guidance in this matter. I think it may have to do with ABP's coin integration, as we have submitted all info to the jl777c/coins repo.

Thanks again guys! Really appreciate it!

Author: Maroof#6879
Content:
hey guys
qq - from my friend - when logging in with the seed which he printed, the 24 words load a different wallet

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: most likely your friend's seed has been modified or trying with wrong one. deleting or adding an empty space would make a different address. check this post for more details. https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000024514-common-wallet-issues
